title: The February Revolution and the Beginning of the Ukrainian Movement (1917)
description: The fall of tsarism in Russia, the formation of the Central Rada, and the first steps toward Ukraine's autonomy. Intensification of political, cultural, and national initiatives.

title: Proclamation of the UPR and the Struggle for Power (1917-1918)
description: The Four Universals of the Central Rada, the proclamation of the Ukrainian People's Republic, conflicts with the Bolsheviks, and the signing of the Brest-Lithuania Peace Treaty.

title: Hetmanate and Directory (1918-1919)
description: The transfer of power to Pavlo Skoropadskyi, the establishment of the Hetmanate, the overthrow of the Hetmanate and the return of the Directory, political instability and internal confrontations.

title: Liberation struggle and final defeat (1919-1921)
description: The Union of the UPR and ZUNR, the Polish-Ukrainian war, Soviet aggression, the defeat of the liberation struggle, and the loss of independence. The end of the period of active struggle for statehood.
